refsect1.title: mDNS Browser API
refsect1.para: The mDNS browser API allows a client program to discover and connect to DMAP services. The dmap_mdns_browser_new function creates a new mDNS browser object. The mDNS browser object emits a "service-added" signal for each DMAP service encountered, and it emits a "service-remove" signal when a service disappears. We describe callbacks in subsequent section.
